post:
Zeropid now providing high performance 2003 and 2008 windows virtual vps servers at very affordable prices. All VPS servers come with remote desktop enabled. All VPS servers are hosted on enterprise grade multi-core Hardware with a minimum of 32/24GBRAM with raid-10 protected storage and offer a 99.9% uptime guarantee.


FEATURES:
-- 2003 and 2008 Windows OS.
-- 2003 and 2008 with MSSQL 2008.
-- Remote Desktop Enabled
-- Free manual reboots.
-- Free OS re-installs.
-- Free OS versions changes.
-- Remote Desktop Enabled
-- Ipv4 and Ipv6 support.
-- One click Upgrades
-- Full Admin Access
-- No Contracts

Q: How long does it take to setup a VPS?
A: On average, less than 6 hours since you ordered your VPS; however we won't take more than 24 hours.

Q: What payment options do you have available?
